Upcoming Events

Impressionist Dinner Night

Date: 2023-09-15

Experience a meal inspired by the works of Monet and Renoir. Each course is a culinary interpretation of a famous Impressionist painting.

Surrealist Cocktail Evening

Date: 2023-10-01

Join us for a night of unexpected flavor combinations and visually stunning cocktails inspired by the Surrealist movement.

Renaissance Feast

Date: 2023-10-20

Step back in time with our Renaissance-inspired feast. Enjoy period-accurate dishes and live medieval music.

Modern Art Tasting Menu

Date: 2023-11-05

Our chef presents a tasting menu inspired by the bold colors and abstract forms of modern art movements.
